content.html: Buddy, I get it. I, too, want to live in a world where I just tweet about Python stuff and make my little video games and don't concern myself with politics. But we don't live in that world. And I figured much too late in life that we've never lived in that world.
content.value:
Buddy, I get it. I, too, want to live in a world where I just tweet about Python stuff and make my little video games and don't concern myself with politics.

But we don't live in that world. And I figured much too late in life that we've never lived in that world.
